episodes.title: The Deceptive Cult of Bill Johnson and Bethel Church
episodes.description:
Is Bill Johnson dangerous? Bethel Church may be the most deceptive church today. With concerns about Bethel, Kris Vallotton and Bethel Church miracle claims, we examine the deceptive cult of Bill Johnson and Bethel Church. 

Between the Jenn Johnson cringey escapade and the misconduct of Bethel School of supernatural ministry can Bethel and Bethel music be trusted?
